channel.title: Muse: a modern CSS framework based on Flexbox
channel.description: Recent content on Muse: a modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

item.title: Dropdown
item.description: Dropdown button   One dropdown item Another dropdown item Active dropdown item Other dropdown item Just a dropdown divider copy <div class="dropdown"> <button class="btn btn-primary dropdown-toggle"> Dropdown button &nbsp; <i class="icon icon-angle-down"></i> </button> <div class="dropdown-menu"> <a class="dropdown-item">One dropdown item</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Another dropdown item</a> <a class="dropdown-item active">Active dropdown item</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Other dropdown item</a> <div class="dropdown-divider"></div> <a class="dropdown-item">Just a dropdown divider</a> </div> </div> Alignment Right aligned   User Posts Setting copy <div class="dropdown dropdown-right"> <button class="btn btn-primary dropdown-toggle"> Right aligned &nbsp; <i class="icon icon-angle-down"></i> </button> <div class="dropdown-menu"> <a class="dropdown-item">User</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Posts</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Setting</a> </div> </div> Dropup button   User Posts Setting copy <div class="dropdown dropdown-up"> <button class="btn btn-primary dropdown-toggle"> Dropup button &nbsp; <i class="icon icon-angle-up"></i> </button> <div class="dropdown-menu"> <a class="dropdown-item">User</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Posts</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Setting</a> </div> </div> Hover or Toggle Hover me   User Posts Setting copy <div class="dropdown dropdown-hover"> <button class="btn btn-primary dropdown-toggle"> Hover me &nbsp; <i class="icon icon-angle-down"></i> </button> <div class="dropdown-menu"> <a class="dropdown-item">User</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Posts</a> <a class="dropdown-item">Setting</a> </div> </div>

item.title: Form
item.description: Email Username This username is available Password This password is invalid Subject Select dropdown With options Message Check me out Yes No Submit copy <form> <!-- email --> <div class="form-group"> <label for="email">Email</label> <input type="email" class="form-control" id="email" placeholder="Enter email" /> </div> <!-- username --> <div class="form-group"> <label for="username">Username</label> <div class="form-field form-icons-left form-icons-right"> <input type="username" class="form-control form-control-success" id="username" placeholder="Enter username" /> <i class="icon icon-github form-icon form-icon-left"></i> <i class="icon icon-check form-icon form-icon-right"></i> </div> <small class="form-text text-success">This username is available</small> </div> <!

item.title: Grid
item.description: col col col col col-9 auto auto col-7 auto auto col-5 auto auto copy <div class="grid-demo text-center text-white"> <div class="row"> <div class="col"><div class="block bg-primary">col</div></div> </div> <div class="row"> <div class="col"><div class="block bg-primary">col</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="block bg-primary">col</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="block bg-primary">col</div></div> </div> <div class="row"> <div class="col-9"><div class="block bg-primary">col-9</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="bg-gray block">auto</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="bg-gray block">auto</div></div> </div> <div class="row"> <div class="col-7"><div class="block bg-primary">col-7</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="bg-gray block">auto</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="bg-gray block">auto</div></div> </div> <div class="row"> <div class="col-5"><div class="block bg-primary">col-5</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="bg-gray block">auto</div></div> <div class="col"><div class="bg-gray block">auto</div></div> </div> </div> Nesting Left Right Right1 Right2 copy <div class="grid-demo text-center text-white"> <div class="row"> <div class="col-8"> <div class="block bg-primary" style="height: 145px; line-height: 104px;">Left</div> </div> <div class="col-4"> <div class="block bg-primary" style="margin-bottom: 8px;">Right</div> <div class="row"> <div class="col"> <div class="block bg-primary">Right1</div> </div> <div class="col"> <div class="block bg-primary">Right2</div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> Responsive You can define a column size for each viewport size: mobile(xs), tablet(sm), and desktop(md~xl).

item.title: Image
item.description: copy <figure class="image" style="width: 128px; height: 128px;"> <img src="/images/128x128.png" alt="128x128"> </figure> Rounded copy <figure class="image image-rounded" style="width: 128px; height: 128px;"> <img src="/images/128x128.png" alt="128x128"> </figure> Responsive copy <figure class="image image-responsive" style="padding-top: 50%;"> <img src="/images/600x300.png" alt="600x300"> </figure>

item.title: Installation
item.description: Use manually Download the compiled and minified css file (core ~10KB min+gzip) Download <link rel="stylesheet" href="./dist/muse.min.css"> Add muse via cdn Alternatively, you can use the unpkg or cdnjs CDN to load compiled muse.css. <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/@16px/cherry/dist/muse.min.css"> We recommend our users to lock Muse's version when using CDN. Please refer to unpkg.com for more information. Install muse via npm npm i @16px/muse --save-dev

item.title: Layout
item.description: Header Main Sidebar copy <div class="text-center text-white"> <div class="bg-gray area">Header</div> <div class="row no-gutters"> <div class="col-9"><div class="bg-gray area">Main</div></div> <div class="col-3"><div class="bg-gray area">Sidebar</div></div> </div> </div>

item.title: Progress
item.description: %15 copy <progress class="progress" value="15" max="100"> %15 </progress> %15 %30 %45 %60 %75 copy <div class="cd-demo"> <progress class="progress progress-primary" value="15" max="100">%15</progress> <progress class="progress progress-info" value="30" max="100">%30</progress> <progress class="progress progress-success" value="45" max="100">%45</progress> <progress class="progress progress-warning" value="60" max="100">%60</progress> <progress class="progress progress-danger" value="75" max="100">%75</progress> </div> %15 %30 %45 copy <div class="cd-demo"> <progress class="progress progress-sm" value="15" max="100">%15</progress> <progress class="progress" value="30" max="100">%30</progress> <progress class="progress progress-lg" value="45" max="100">%45</progress> </div>

item.title: Table
item.description: # First Last Handle 1 Mark Otto @mmo 1 John Wi @add 1 Jenny Otto @uuy Modifiers Add borders to all the cells. table table-bordered One Two Three Four Add stripes to the table. table table-striped One Two Three Four Five Six Seven Eight Nine Ten You can add a hover effect on each row table table-hover One Two Three Four Five Six Seven Eight Nine Ten You can have a fullwidth table.

item.title: Tabs
item.description: Video Gallery Music copy <div class="tabs"> <ul> <li class="tab-item active"><i class="icon icon-video"></i>Video</li> <li class="tab-item"><i class="icon icon-gallery"></i>Gallery</li> <li class="tab-item"><i class="icon icon-music"></i>Music</li> </ul> </div> Alignment Video Gallery Music copy <div class="tabs tabs-center"> <ul> <li class="tab-item"><i class="icon icon-video"></i>Video</li> <li class="tab-item active"><i class="icon icon-gallery"></i>Gallery</li> <li class="tab-item"><i class="icon icon-music"></i>Music</li> </ul> </div>

item.title: Tag
item.description: Primary Info Success Warning Danger copy <span class="tag tag-primary">Primary</span> <span class="tag tag-info">Info</span> <span class="tag tag-success">Success</span> <span class="tag tag-warning">Warning</span> <span class="tag tag-danger">Danger</span>

item.title: Tooltip
item.description: Tooltips provide context information labels that appear on hover and focus. Tooltips component is built entirely in CSS. Top Button Left Button Right Button Bottom Button copy <p class="text-center"> <button class="btn btn-primary tooltip" data-tooltip="I'm top tooltip">Top Button</button> </p> <p class="text-right"> <button class="btn btn-primary tooltip tooltip-left" data-tooltip="I'm left tooltip">Left Button</button> </p> <p> <button class="btn btn-primary tooltip tooltip-right" data-tooltip="I'm right tooltip">Right Button</button> </p> <p class="text-center"> <button class="btn btn-primary tooltip tooltip-bottom" data-tooltip="I'm bottom tooltip">Bottom Button</button> </p>

item.title: Typography
item.description: Size Class Font-size font-1 3rem font-2 2.5rem font-3 2rem font-4 1.5rem font-5 1.25em font-6 1rem Transform Lowercased text. Uppercased text. CapiTaliZed text. copy <p class="text-lowercase">Lowercased text.</p> <p class="text-uppercase">Uppercased text.</p> <p class="text-capitalize">CapiTaliZed text.</p> Weight and Italics Bold text. Normal weight text. Light weight text. Italic text.
